import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function

import re

def extract_entities(input_string):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|can|is)\s*(used|transmit|process|receive|send|acquire|store|validate|calibrate|translate|display|communicate|provide|set|have|be)\s*(to|for|with|in|of|from|on|at|by|as)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, input_string)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|can|is)\s*(used|transmit|process|receive|send|acquire|store|validate|calibrate|translate|display|communicate|provide|set|have|be)\s*(to|for|with|in|of|from|on|at|by|as)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, input_string)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|can|is)\s*(used|transmit|process|receive|send|acquire|store|validate|calibrate|translate|display|communicate|provide|set|have|be)\s*(to|for|with|in|of|from|on|at|by|as)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, input_string)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|can|is)\s*(used|transmit|process|receive|send|acquire|store|validate|calibrate|translate|display|communicate|provide|set|have|be)\s*(to|for|with|in|of|from|on|at|by|as)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, input_string)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[0])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|can|is)\s*(used|transmit|process|receive|send|acquire|store|validate|calibrate|translate|display|communicate|provide|set|have|be)\s*(to|for|with|in|of|from|on|at|by|as)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, input_string)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|can|is)\s*(used|transmit|process|receive|send|acquire|store|validate|calibrate|translate|display|communicate|provide|set|have|be)\s*(to|for|with|in|of|from|on|at|by|as)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, input_string)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[0])

    return entities

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'the\s+(?:Center|Tactical Control System|CCTNS system|APAF system|Correlator Monitor and Control System|VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System|device status requestor)'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append(re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(?:Vehicle Priority|device status requestor)'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append(re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(?:flight corridors|restricted airspace|personnel|interstates and state highways|map|DMS|Traffic Signal|Reversible Lane|Dynamic Lane|Bus Location|LCS|HAR|School Zone|The map|A configuration file|The Correlator Monitor and Control System|The device status requestor|The Center|Light/Commuter Location)'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append(re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence).group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(?:VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System|DMS|The map)'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append(re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(?:to support LCS control in other centers|to support Ramp Meter control in other centers|to support Reversible Lane control in other centers|to support Traffic Signal control in other centers|to support School Zone control in other centers|to support Dynamic Lane control in other centers|to support HAR control in other centers|to support DMS control in other centers|to provide access to the interfaces|to specify specific speed values|built-in error handling for better data integrity|transfer dynamic control data|monitor data)'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append(re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(?:device control command|network identifier|reversible lane identifier|username|password|plan|duration|Target Dynamic Lane and Plan|Target Reversible Lane and Plan|Target Traffic Signal and Plan|Target DMS|Message to be displayed|Beacons On/Off|status information|link identifier|bus identifier|bus name|location|schedule adherece|configuration information|a physical correlator hardware configuration|information for command timeframe request|days commands accepted|times commands accepted|indicator status|indicator failure state|dynamic control data|interstates and state highways|vehicle identifier|intersection identifier)'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence))

    return json.dumps(entities)

print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System flight route planner will be able to designate flight corridors and restricted airspace."))

import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function

import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(The|the)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(to|To)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
input_string = "The Tactical Control System shall provide the capability to create waypoints that define the desired flight path, define AV Altitude and Airspeed associated with the waypoint."
print(extract_entities(input_string))
```

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+[\s\w]+[a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+[\s\w]+[a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+[\s\w]+[a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+[\s\w]+[a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+[\s\w]+[a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("A de-clutter capability shall be provided that allows the operator to display only a selected number of the most significant threats."))
```

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],

        'Shared Phenomena': []

    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b', sentence)

    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b', sentence)

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\sboard\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\soperator\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\sVLA\sExpansion\sProject\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bclearly\sindicated\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\bmap\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall provide the operator with a clearly indicated map scale."))

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:Center|Monitor and Control System|Correlator Monitor and Control System|Remote GUI|GUI|Tactical Control System|Center|LCS|HAR|HOV|DMS|Traffic Signal|Reversible Lane|Dynamic Lane|Vehicle Priority|CCTV|Ramp Meter|ESS)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:Vehicle Priority|environmental sensor|environment sensor|CCTV|Ramp Meter)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the\ user|the\ desired\ AV|the\ map|the\ user|a\ LCS|a\ HAR|a\ HOV|a\ Traffic Signal|a\ Reversible Lane|a\ Dynamic Lane|a\ DMS|a\ ramp meter|a\ ESS)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:upper system|Each\ presentation\ segment)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:To\ support\ HAR\ control\ in\ other\ centers|To\ support\ Traffic\ Signal\ control\ in\ other\ centers|To\ support\ LCS\ control\ in\ other\ centers|To\ support\ Dynamic\ Lane\ control\ in\ other\ centers|To\ support\ HOV\ Lane\ control\ in\ other\ centers|To\ support\ Ramp\ Meter\ control\ in\ other\ centers|To\ support\ video\ snapshots)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*capable\s*of\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*a\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*capable\s*of\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*receive\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[0])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*capable\s*of\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*capable\s*of\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1])

    return json.dumps(entities)

def extract_entities(sentence):

    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ["Software System", "Physical Device", "Environment Object", "External System", "System Requirements", "Shared Phenomena"]
    
    # Extract entities
    for token in tokens:
        if token in entity_types:
            entities[token].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ["the", "a", "an"]:
            continue
        else:
            for entity_type in entity_types:
                if entity_type == "System Requirements":
                    if token.lower() in ["to", "for", "with"]:
                        entities[entity_type].append(token)
                elif entity_type == "Shared Phenomena":
                    if token.lower() in ["of", "in", "on", "at", "with"]:
                        entities[entity_type].append(token)
                else:
                    entities[entity_type].append(token)
    
    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|support|utilize|use|include|contain|have|be able to|be capable of)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|support|utilize|use|include|contain|have|be able to|be capable of)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|support|utilize|use|include|contain|have|be able to|be capable of)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|support|utilize|use|include|contain|have|be able to|be capable of)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+system"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:to|for)\s+(?:support|utilize|use|include|contain|have|be able to|be capable of)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:to|for)\s+(?:support|utilize|use|include|contain|have|be able to|be capable of)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+System"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group().replace(' the ', '').replace(' System', ''))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+correlator|the\s+Master\s+Correlator\s+Control\s+Computer"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group().replace(' the ', '').replace(' correlator', '').replace(' Master Correlator Control Computer', ''))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group().replace(' a ', ''))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System|the\s+VLA\s+Expansion\s+Project\s+Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System|the\s+C-2-C\s+software\s+system|a\s+Texas\s+Department\s+of\s+Transportation\s+C2C\s+project|a\s+DMS"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group().replace(' the ', '').replace(' Monitor and Control System', '').replace(' the ', '').replace(' VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System', '').replace(' the ', '').replace(' C-2-C software system', '').replace(' a ', '').replace(' Texas Department of Transportation C2C project', '').replace(' a ', ''))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"To\s+support\s+[A-Z][a-z]+(?:\s+[A-Z][a-z]+)*\s+control\s+in\s+other\s+centers"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group().replace(' To support ', '').replace(' control in other centers', ''))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"configuration\s+information|a\s+physical\s+correlator\s+hardware\s+configuration|Correlator\s+configurations|control\s+instructions|device\s+control\s+command|network\s+identifier|traffic\s+signal\s+identifier|username|password|traffic\s+signal\s+plan\s+identifier|device\s+control\s+command|network\s+identifier|LCS\s+identifier|message|equipment\s+requests|status\s+and\s+error\s+messages|full\s+system\s+access|plan|duration|models|time\s+standards|fiber-link\s+phase\s+corrections|control\s+data|Target\s+Traffic\s+Signal\s+and\s+Plan|operator\s+selection|a\s+specific\s+AV"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [word for word in physical_devices if word not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [word for word in environment_objects if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [word for word in external_systems if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System'] and word not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for system in software_systems:
        entities['Software System'].append(system)

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for device in physical_devices:
        if device not in entities['Software System']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(device)

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for obj in environment_objects:
        if obj not in entities['Software System'] and obj not in entities['Physical Device']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(obj)

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for system in external_systems:
        if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device']:
            entities['External System'].append(system)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for req in system_requirements:
        if req not in entities['Software System'] and req not in entities['Physical Device'] and req not in entities['Environment Object'] and req not in entities['External System']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(req)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for phenomenon in shared_phenomena:
        if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(phenomenon)

    return json.dumps(entities)

    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:device|controller|sensor|system)"

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {

        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"a\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall (?:allow|process|transfer|monitor|receive|translate|perform|communicate|support|provide|use|be|have|incorporate|accept|take|recover|set|maintain|have|be equipped with|have to be within|be in communication with) ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (?:controller|device|unit|system|computer|hardware|sensor|thermostat|humidistat|contact|security sound|light|power|switch|correlator|subsystem|fiber-link|phase|correlator|correlator hardware|master control|environmental controller|controller device|sensor|device|system|computer|hardware|sensor|thermostat|humidistat|contact|security sound|light|power|switch)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (?:user|operator|personnel|system|device|requestor|center|system|data|information|message|signal|plan|identifier|password|username|time|standards|models|correlator|correlator hardware|correlator subsystem|flight behavior characteristics|AV|selected AV)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (?:database|card|tap|hard disk|system|data|information|message|signal|plan|identifier|password|username|time|standards|models|correlator|correlator hardware|correlator subsystem|flight behavior characteristics|AV|selected AV)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[0].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:to|for|in order to|in order|to allow|to support|to provide|to use|to be|to have|to be equipped with|to be in communication with) ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0].strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (?:data|information|message|signal|plan|identifier|password|username|time|standards|models|correlator|correlator hardware|correlator subsystem|flight behavior characteristics|AV|selected AV|configuration|command|control|request|response|error|exception|condition|health|faults|correlator|correlator hardware|correlator subsystem|fiber-link|phase|correlator|correlator hardware|correlator subsystem|environmental controller|controller device|sensor|device|system|computer|hardware|sensor|thermostat|humidistat|contact|security sound|light|power|switch)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[0].strip())

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(text):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)', text)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ device)', text)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', text)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', text)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+)', text)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', text)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', text)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

        'Shared Phenomena': []

    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)|([A-Z][a-z]+)|([a-z]+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+)|([a-z]+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)|([A-Z][a-z]+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+)|([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)|([A-Z][a-z]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)|([A-Z][a-z]+)|([a-z]+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+ in [A-Z][a-z]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function

    physical_devices += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    environment_objects += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ requirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ phenomenon\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+controller|(\w+)\s+sensor|(\w+)\s+alarms|(\w+)\s+switches"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+identifier|(\w+)\s+name|(\w+)\s+location|(\w+)\s+status"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+system|(\w+)\s+environment"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+control|(\w+)\s+configuration|(\w+)\s+testing|(\w+)\s+servicing"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+status|(\w+)\s+location|(\w+)\s+status|(\w+)\s+plan|(\w+)\s+duration"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group().replace('the ', ''))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:device|controller|switch|sensor|system)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:file|user|map|system)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:system|database|card|disk)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:to|shall|will)\s+(?:be|have|include|provide|monitor|regulate|achieve|display|send|receive|process|transfer|continue|recover|change|manage|continue|accept|package|control|deliver|display|pass|have|be|include|provide|monitor|regulate|achieve|display|send|receive|process|transfer|continue|recover|change|manage|continue|accept|package|control|deliver|display|pass)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group().replace('to ', '').replace('shall ', '').replace('will ', ''))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:fuel|temperature|humidity|contact|power|switch|light|alarm|sound|data|information|configuration|hardware|software|system|time|standards|phase|corrections|models|feeds|control|data|messages|flow|rate|bingo|fuel|parameters|remaining|flow|rate|bingo|fuel)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall be capable of displaying fuel parameters to the operator to include as a minimum, remaining fuel, flow rate, and bingo fuel."))

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|process|receive|send|get|translate|calculate|acquire|provide|aid|support|use|have|contain|include|be|have|process|receive|send|get|translate|calculate|acquire|provide|aid|support|use|have|contain|include)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)System"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:a|an|the)\s+(?:thermostat|humdistat|power|TCP|Correlator|Master Correlator Control|VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control|DigitalHome|Space Fractions|APAF ground data|APAF system|APAF Operations Procedures Document|Monitor and Control|Tactical Control)\s+device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:a|an|the)\s+(?:user|patient|sun|old|personnel|NASA PDS|ESOC)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:a|an|the)\s+(?:database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|dedicated|VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control|NASA PDS)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:shall|must|should|can|will)\s+(?:be|have|process|receive|send|get|translate|calculate|acquire|provide|aid|support|use|have|contain|include|be|have|process|receive|send|get|translate|calculate|acquire|provide|aid|support|use|have|contain|include)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:the|all|any|some|every|each|each\s+of|every\s+of|some\s+of|any\s+of|each\s+of|every\s+of|some\s+of|any\s+of)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(text):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', text)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', text)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', text)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', text)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', text)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', text)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(\w+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can)\s*(\w+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can)\s*(\w+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can)\s*(\w+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[0])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can)\s*(\w+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can)\s*(\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities

    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):

import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bthe\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

import json
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ unit\b|\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ system\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+ control\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+ support\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ data\b|\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ information\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall\s*be\s*able\s*to|shall\s*be\s*capable|shall\s*be\s*able|shall\s*be\s*used|shall\s*be\s*able\s*to)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall\s*be\s*able\s*to|shall\s*be\s*capable|shall\s*be\s*able|shall\s*be\s*used|shall\s*be\s*able\s*to)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[2])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall\s*be\s*able\s*to|shall\s*be\s*capable|shall\s*be\s*able|shall\s*be\s*used|shall\s*be\s*able\s*to)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall\s*be\s*able\s*to|shall\s*be\s*capable|shall\s*be\s*able|shall\s*be\s*used|shall\s*be\s*able\s*to)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return json.dumps(entities)

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    for system in software_systems:
        entities['Software System'].append(system)

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for device in physical_devices:
        if device not in entities['Software System']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(device)

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for object in environment_objects:
        if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(object)

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for system in external_systems:
        if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device']:
            entities['External System'].append(system)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for requirement in system_requirements:
        if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(requirement)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for phenomenon in shared_phenomena:
        if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(phenomenon)

    return json.dumps(entities)

        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ unit\b|the [A-Z][a-z]+',
        'Environment Object': r'\bthe [A-Z][a-z]+\b|a [A-Z][a-z]+',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b|a [A-Z][a-z]+',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b|be able to [A-Z][a-z]+\b|have the ability to [A-Z][a-z]+\b|support [A-Z][a-z]+\b|allow for [A-Z][a-z]+\b|include [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ signals\b|data\b|messages\b|information\b|network identifier\b|device type\b|username\b|password\b|traffic signal identifier\b|traffic signal plan identifier\b|equipment requests\b|device control command\b|command timeframe request\b|days commands accepted\b|times commands accepted\b|HAR identifier\b|message\b|CCTV switching command\b|Source\b|Destination port\b|all auxiliary data\b|real time update of correlator parameters\b|correlator parameters\b|correlator power monitoring and control\b|Monitor and Control System network failure\b|access to all messaging, monitor, and control traffic\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([a-z]+ device)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ database|([A-Z][a-z]+ card|([A-Z][a-z]+ tap|([A-Z][a-z]+ hard disk))', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|support|allow|process|transfer|monitor|receive|send|get|put|use|use\s+to)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.strip() for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+shall\s+(?:be|have|support|allow|process|transfer|monitor|receive|send|get|put|use|use\s+to)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[0].strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+shall\s+(?:be|have|support|allow|process|transfer|monitor|receive|send|get|put|use|use\s+to)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[0].strip() for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+shall\s+(?:be|have|support|allow|process|transfer|monitor|receive|send|get|put|use|use\s+to)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[0].strip() for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|support|allow|process|transfer|monitor|receive|send|get|put|use|use\s+to)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match.strip() for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+shall\s+(?:be|have|support|allow|process|transfer|monitor|receive|send|get|put|use|use\s+to)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1].strip() for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(input_string):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, input_string)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'to ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, input_string)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) data'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.strip() for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall be capable of'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match.strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall be provided to'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match.strip() for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall be integrated into'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match.strip() for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'to ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match.strip() for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) data'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match.strip() for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ Device\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ System\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ to [A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+ and [A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+)(?:\s+shall|shall\s+be|shall\s+have)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)(?:\s+alarm|switch|contact|sensor|magnetic|sound|light)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+)(?:\s+map|user|vehicle|door|window)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+)(?:\s+database|card|tap|disk)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:to\s+support|shall\s+have|shall\s+be|shall\s+have\s+the\s+capability)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)(?:\s+identifier|name|description|status|failure|state)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|provide|support|receive|process|transfer|monitor|display|calculate|compute|determine|estimate|predict|generate|create|store|update|delete|modify|change|replace|add|remove|insert|delete|update|modify|change|replace|add|remove|insert)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|provide|support|receive|process|transfer|monitor|display|calculate|compute|determine|estimate|predict|generate|create|store|update|delete|modify|change|replace|add|remove|insert|delete|update|modify|change|replace|add|remove|insert)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|provide|support|receive|process|transfer|monitor|display|calculate|compute|determine|estimate|predict|generate|create|store|update|delete|modify|change|replace|add|remove|insert|delete|update|modify|change|replace|add|remove|insert)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+object"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|provide|support|receive|process|transfer|monitor|display|calculate|compute|determine|estimate|predict|generate|create|store|update|delete|modify|change|replace|add|remove|insert|delete|update|modify|change|replace|add|remove|insert)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+system"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|provide|support|receive|process|transfer|monitor|display|calculate|compute|determine|estimate|predict|generate|create|store|update|delete|modify|change|replace|add|remove|insert|delete|update|modify|change|replace|add|remove|insert)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|provide|support|receive|process|transfer|monitor|display|calculate|compute|determine|estimate|predict|generate|create|store|update|delete|modify|change|replace|add|remove|insert|delete|update|modify|change|replace|add|remove|insert)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return json.dumps(entities)
