import re
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the entity types and their corresponding keywords
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': ['system', 'software', 'application'],
        'Physical Device': ['device', 'machine', 'equipment'],
        'Environment Object': ['object', 'entity', 'thing'],
        'External System': ['system', 'database', 'repository'],
        'System Requirements': ['requirement', 'need', 'specification'],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in entity_types.keys()}

    # Iterate over the tokens and extract entities
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, keywords in entity_types.items():
            if any(re.match(r'\b' + keyword + r'\b', token, re.IGNORECASE) for keyword in keywords):
                result[entity_type].append(token)

    # Handle non-existent entity types
    for token in tokens:
        if token not in [item for sublist in result.values() for item in sublist]:
            result['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    return result

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|support|process|receive|translate|display|aid|determine|express)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(2).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|support|process|receive|translate|display|aid|determine|express)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(2).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|support|process|receive|translate|display|aid|determine|express)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|support|process|receive|translate|display|aid|determine|express)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+system"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(2).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|support|process|receive|translate|display|aid|determine|express)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+requirement"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(2).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|support|process|receive|translate|display|aid|determine|express)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return entities

    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(be|have|use|contain|include)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|use|send|receive|get|contain|include)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|be|have|use|contain|include)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|use|send|receive|get|contain|include)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[2])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|be|have|use|contain|include)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|be|have|use|contain|include)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b|TCP/IP|the correlator|the homeâ€™s broadband Internet connection|a master control device|the home devices|sensors|controllers|an RF Module|contact sensors|security alarms|environmental sensor|the Gateway|Gateway|IOs|CCTV|each CCTV|each ESS',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b|the patient|the sun|the old|each roadway network|each CCTV|each ESS|citizens|room staff|these interfaces',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b|a database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|the existing system|upper system|Backend Data Processing System',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b|to exchange device control information between TMCs|to support Traffic Signal control in other centers|to support video snapshots|send and receive communication|ensure secure transmission|ensure high standards of security and access control|transfer dynamic control data|monitor data|focus on delivering value|records room staff and citizens|support multiple types of communication services for remote access|utilizing parameterized queries',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b|traffic data|device control information|wireless signals|information for command timeframe request|network identifier|device type|days commands accepted|times commands accepted|status information|network identifier|traffic signal identifier|traffic signal name|location|status|information about network device status|DMS status data|LCS status data|CCTV status data|the incoming data|user request|dynamic control data|environmental sensor identifier|environment sensor name|type|records|authentication and information encryption|the DATEX/ASN data|information about network device status|number of DMSs|number of LCSs|operational/voice communications'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, value in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(value, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(\w+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|use|be)\s*(\w+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|be)\s*(\w+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|be)\s*(\w+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[2])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|be)\s*(\w+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|be)\s*(\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall have the capability to establish and subsequently terminate analog communication with peripheral devices."))

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ unit|the [A-Za-z]+)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+|the [A-Za-z]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+|the [A-Za-z]+)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"([A-Za-z]+ to [A-Za-z]+ in [A-Za-z]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+|the [A-Za-z]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    # Other entities
    other_entities_pattern = r"([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+|the [A-Za-z]+)"
    other_entities_match = re.search(other_entities_pattern, sentence)
    if other_entities_match:
        if other_entities_match.group() not in entities['Software System'] and \
           other_entities_match.group() not in entities['Physical Device'] and \
           other_entities_match.group() not in entities['Environment Object'] and \
           other_entities_match.group() not in entities['External System'] and \
           other_entities_match.group() not in entities['System Requirements'] and \
           other_entities_match.group() not in entities['Shared Phenomena']:
            if other_entities_match.group().startswith('the'):
                entities['Environment Object'].append(other_entities_match.group())
            else:
                entities['Physical Device'].append(other_entities_match.group())

    return json.dumps(entities)

        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(System|System\s*)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(controller|sensor|alarm|switch|unit|computer|archive|terminal|interface|system|system\s*)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(team|project|system|space|team\s*)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(system|system\s*)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[0].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(to|shall|will|can|should|is|are|has|have|had|do|does|did|be|been|being)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(be|been|being|have|has|had|do|does|did|is|are)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2].strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(data|information|messages|signals|products|state|status|values|events|states|values|data\s*)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[0].strip())

    return json.dumps(entities)

    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s*be\s*automatically\s*checked\s*for\s*errors\s*and\s*corrected\s*when\s*possible"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena

    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|use|have|utilize|implement|develop|create|design|build|establish|provide|support|maintain|use|utilize|implement|develop|create|design|build|establish|provide|support|maintain)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.strip() for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+(?:be|use|have|utilize|implement|develop|create|design|build|establish|provide|support|maintain|use|utilize|implement|develop|create|design|build|establish|provide|support|maintain)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[0].strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+(?:be|use|have|utilize|implement|develop|create|design|build|establish|provide|support|maintain|use|utilize|implement|develop|create|design|build|establish|provide|support|maintain)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[0].strip() for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|use|have|utilize|implement|develop|create|design|build|establish|provide|support|maintain|use|utilize|implement|develop|create|design|build|establish|provide|support|maintain)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match.strip() for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|use|have|utilize|implement|develop|create|design|build|establish|provide|support|maintain|use|utilize|implement|develop|create|design|build|establish|provide|support|maintain)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match.strip() for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|use|have|utilize|implement|develop|create|design|build|establish|provide|support|maintain|use|utilize|implement|develop|create|design|build|establish|provide|support|maintain)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match.strip() for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(be|have|allow|process|transfer|monitor|support|provide|execute|display|access|use|enable|enable\s+to)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+shall\s+(be|have|allow|process|transfer|monitor|support|provide|execute|display|access|use|enable|enable\s+to)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+shall\s+(be|have|allow|process|transfer|monitor|support|provide|execute|display|access|use|enable|enable\s+to)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+shall\s+(be|have|allow|process|transfer|monitor|support|provide|execute|display|access|use|enable|enable\s+to)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[0].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(be|have|allow|process|transfer|monitor|support|provide|execute|display|access|use|enable|enable\s+to)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+shall\s+(be|have|allow|process|transfer|monitor|support|provide|execute|display|access|use|enable|enable\s+to)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1].strip())

    return entities

    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(be|have|process|transfer|monitor|display|support|use|implement|execute|aid|assist|provide|make|develop|access|upgrade|configure|operate|service|control|manage|maintain|analyze|test|validate|verify|certify|authenticate|authorize|validate|authenticate|authorize)\s+(.*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shall\s+(be|have|process|transfer|monitor|display|support|use|implement|execute|aid|assist|provide|make|develop|access|upgrade|configure|operate|service|control|manage|maintain|analyze|test|validate|verify|certify|authenticate|authorize|validate|authenticate|authorize)\s+(.*)"

        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}

    # Extract entities for each type
    for entity_type, pattern in entity_types.items():
        for token in tokens:
            if re.match(pattern, token):
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities
    return extracted_entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {'Software System': [], 'Physical Device': [], 'Environment Object': [], 'External System': [], 'System Requirements': [], 'Shared Phenomena': []}
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]
    
    return entities

# Test the function

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []

    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) user"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) software"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) to ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) signals"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', text)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System

    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements

    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', text)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [word for word in physical_devices if word not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [word for word in environment_objects if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [word for word in external_systems if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System'] and word not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities

    # Physical Device

    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b'

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(\w+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|can|will)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|can|will)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|can|will)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[2])

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for system in software_systems:
        entities['Software System'].append(system)

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for device in physical_devices:
        if device not in entities['Software System']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(device)

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for object in environment_objects:
        if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(object)

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for system in external_systems:
        if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']:
            entities['External System'].append(system)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for requirement in system_requirements:
        if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(requirement)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    for phenomenon in shared_phenomena:
        if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(phenomenon)

    return entities

```python
import re
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': r'software|system',
        'Physical Device': r'device',
        'Environment Object': r'object',
        'External System': r'system',
        'System Requirements': r'requirement',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'phenomena'
    }

    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)

    # Identify the entity types
    entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types.keys()}

    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, pattern in entity_types.items():
            if re.search(pattern, token, re.IGNORECASE):
                entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities
    return entities
```

import re
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}
    
    # Extract entities
    for token in tokens:
        # Check if the token is a noun
        if pos_tag([token])[0][1] in ['NN', 'NNS', 'NNP', 'NNPS']:
            # Check if the token is a software system
            if re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', token):
                extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a physical device
            elif re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', token) and 'device' in token.lower():
                extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an environment object
            elif re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', token) and 'object' in token.lower():
                extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an external system
            elif re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', token) and 'system' in token.lower():
                extracted_entities['External System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a system requirement
            elif re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', token) and 'requirement' in token.lower():
                extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a shared phenomenon
            elif re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', token) and 'phenomenon' in token.lower():
                extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)
    
    return extracted_entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [word for word in physical_devices if word not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [word for word in environment_objects if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [word for word in external_systems if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System'] and word not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
import re
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}
    
    # Extract entities for each entity type
    for token in tokens:
        # Check if the token is a noun
        if pos_tag([token])[0][1] in ['NN', 'NNS', 'NNP', 'NNPS']:
            # Check if the token matches any entity type
            for entity_type in entity_types:
                if entity_type in token:
                    extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)
    
    return extracted_entities

# Test the function

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [word for word in physical_devices if word not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [word for word in environment_objects if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [word for word in external_systems if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System'] and word not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return json.dumps(entities)

import nltk
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}
    
    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        # Check if the token is a noun
        if pos_tag([token])[0][1] in ['NN', 'NNS', 'NNP', 'NNPS']:
            # Check if the token is a software system
            if token.lower() in ['system', 'software']:
                extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a physical device
            elif token.lower() in ['device', 'hardware']:
                extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an environment object
            elif token.lower() in ['environment', 'object']:
                extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an external system
            elif token.lower() in ['system', 'interface']:
                extracted_entities['External System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a system requirement
            elif token.lower() in ['requirement', 'require']:
                extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a shared phenomenon
            elif token.lower() in ['phenomenon', 'event']:
                extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)
    
    # Return the extracted entities
    return extracted_entities

# Test the function

    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():

        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+s?\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+s?\b', sentence)
    environment_object = [word for word in environment_object if word not in physical_device]
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+s?\b', sentence)
    external_system = [word for word in external_system if word not in physical_device and word not in environment_object]
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+s?\b', sentence)
    system_requirements = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in physical_device and word not in environment_object and word not in external_system]
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+s?\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in physical_device and word not in environment_object and word not in external_system and word not in system_requirements]
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall have the functionality to transfer digital data as well as digital imagery to and from external data storage systems."))

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(be|have|include|use|support|provide|allow|enable|contain|have|include|use|support|provide|allow|enable|contain)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|is|are|has|have|include|use|support|provide|allow|enable|contain|have|include|use|support|provide|allow|enable|contain)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|is|are|has|have|include|use|support|provide|allow|enable|contain|have|include|use|support|provide|allow|enable|contain)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|is|are|has|have|include|use|support|provide|allow|enable|contain|have|include|use|support|provide|allow|enable|contain)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[2])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|is|are|has|have|include|use|support|provide|allow|enable|contain|have|include|use|support|provide|allow|enable|contain)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|can|is|are|has|have|include|use|support|provide|allow|enable|contain|have|include|use|support|provide|allow|enable|contain)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ System)'

    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
input_string = "The RTP interface shall support distributed processing capability."
print(extract_entities(input_string))

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s+\w+\s+System)"
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s+\w+)"
    matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'].extend(matches)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s+the\s+\w+)"
    matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'].extend(matches)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s+\w+\s+system)"
    matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'].extend(matches)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s+to\s+\w+)"
    matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'].extend(matches)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s+and\s+\w+)"
    matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(matches)

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|a [a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|a [a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|a [a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|to [a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|a [a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall incorporate an intercom system that provides verbal communicate in the situation where there are multiple operators."))

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ unit\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ user\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ interfaces\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ system\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ interface\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ service\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ shall\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ should\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ communication\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ signals\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ data\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+shall\s+be\s+a|(\w+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        if match[0]:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0])
        elif match[1]:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+shall\s+be\s+able\s+to|(\w+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        if match[0]:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0])
        elif match[1]:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+shall\s+be\s+able\s+to|(\w+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        if match[0]:
            entities['External System'].append(match[0])
        elif match[1]:
            entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"To\s+support\s+(\w+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+),\s+including\s+(\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(match)

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(be|use|have|support|allow|provide|implement|enable|execute|transmit|accept|process|transfer|monitor|control|access|upgrade|generate|simulate|handle|recover|swapped|hot-swapped)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(communicate|send|receive|get|put|access|accept|process|transfer|monitor|control|upgrade|generate|simulate|handle|recover|swapped|hot-swapped)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|has|have|include|contain|consist|comprise|make|form|be|exist|exist|have|support|allow|provide|implement|enable|execute|transmit|accept|process|transfer|monitor|control|access|upgrade|generate|simulate|handle|recover|swapped|hot-swapped)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(support|allow|provide|implement|enable|execute|transmit|accept|process|transfer|monitor|control|access|upgrade|generate|simulate|handle|recover|swapped|hot-swapped)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[2])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|should|must|can|be|have|support|allow|provide|implement|enable|execute|transmit|accept|process|transfer|monitor|control|access|upgrade|generate|simulate|handle|recover|swapped|hot-swapped)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|should|must|can|be|have|support|allow|provide|implement|enable|execute|transmit|accept|process|transfer|monitor|control|access|upgrade|generate|simulate|handle|recover|swapped|hot-swapped)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function

import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:an|a)\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:device|system|unit|interface|controller|switch|power|supply|system|interface|unit|controller|switch|power|supply)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:a|an)\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:system|database|card|disk|interface|unit|controller|switch|power|supply)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:to|for)\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:[a-z]+)+"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:state|data|information|signal|time|power|temperature|humidity|light|security)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function

import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Software System'].extend(software_system_matches)

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*device"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Physical Device'].extend(physical_device_matches)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Environment Object'].extend(environment_object_matches)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, input_string)
    entities['External System'].extend(external_system_matches)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*requirement"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, input_string)
    entities['System Requirements'].extend(system_requirements_matches)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*data"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(shared_phenomena_matches)

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(.*)"
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*have\s*to\s*be\s*within\s*(\d*)\s*feet\s*of\s*the\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*provided\s*with\s*the\s*capability\s*to\s*(.*)"
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*support\s*the\s*following\s*information\s*for\s*(.*)"
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['External System'].append(match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"The\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(.*)"
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.group(2))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*have\s*both\s*UTC\s*and\s*wall\s*clock\s*time\s*stamp\s*information\s*appropriate\s*for\s*the\s*(.*)"
    match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(2))

    return json.dumps(entities)
