```python
import nltk
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}
    
    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        # Check if the token is a noun
        if pos_tag([token])[0][1] in ['NN', 'NNS', 'NNP', 'NNPS']:
            # Check if the token is a software system
            if token.lower() in ['system', 'software']:
                extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a physical device
            elif token.lower() in ['device', 'controller', 'sensor']:
                extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an environment object
            elif token.lower() in ['environment', 'object']:
                extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an external system
            elif token.lower() in ['system', 'database', 'card']:
                extracted_entities['External System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a system requirement
            elif token.lower() in ['requirement', 'require', 'need']:
                extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a shared phenomenon
            elif token.lower() in ['phenomenon', 'event', 'state', 'value']:
                extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)
    
    # Return the extracted entities
    return extracted_entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("For mission planning, the Tactical Control System shall provide terrain avoidance warning and minimum reception altitude calculations for line of sight flights."))
``` 

    }

```python
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sdevice\b', text)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object

    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System

    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements

    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\smessage\b|\b\w+\ssignal\b', text)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group().replace(' the ', ' ').replace(' System', ''))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group().replace(' the ', ' ').replace(' device', ''))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?object"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group().replace(' a ', ' ').replace(' object', ''))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?system"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group().replace(' a ', ' ').replace(' system', ''))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?requirement"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group().replace(' the ', ' ').replace(' requirement', ''))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?phenomenon"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group().replace(' a ', ' ').replace(' phenomenon', ''))

    return entities
``` 

```python
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

import re

```python
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)

    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}

    # Extract entities for each entity type
    for token in tokens:
        # Check if the token is a noun
        if pos_tag([token])[0][1] in ['NN', 'NNS', 'NNP', 'NNPS']:
            # Check if the token is a software system
            if re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', token):
                extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a physical device
            elif re.match(r'\b[a-z]*\b', token):
                extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an environment object
            elif re.match(r'\b[a-z]*\b', token):
                extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an external system
            elif re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', token):
                extracted_entities['External System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a system requirement
            elif re.match(r'\b[a-z]*\b', token):
                extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a shared phenomenon
            elif re.match(r'\b[a-z]*\b', token):
                extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    return extracted_entities
``` 

    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(map|police personnel|Reversible Lane|ramp meter|user|ASPERA-3 team|ASPERA-3 Co-Iâ€™s|SwRI|the ASPERA-3 team|the ASPERA-3 Co-Iâ€™s|the Center|the Center-to-Center Project|the user)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)

    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)

    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

```python
import json
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([a-z]+ to [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ and [a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall be accredited by the Designated Approving Authority prior to processing classified as well as sensitive unclassified data."))
```

```python
    if physical_device_match:

    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(report|document|procedures|personnel|space|time|day)"

        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(database|card|tap|disk|stripe|system)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(requirement|security|access|control|validation|calibration|configuration|maintenance|operation|use)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
``` 

```python
def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ requirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ phenomenon\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
``` 

import re

    }

    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) object'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) requirements'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) phenomena'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}
    
    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        # Remove punctuation
        token = re.sub(r'[^\w\s]', '', token)
        
        # Check if the token is a proper noun (Environment Object)
        if token.istitle():
            extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
        
        # Check if the token is a common noun (Physical Device)
        elif token.islower():
            extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
        
        # Check if the token is a proper noun (Software System)
        elif token.istitle():
            extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
        
        # Check if the token is a common noun (External System)
        elif token.islower():
            extracted_entities['External System'].append(token)
        
        # Check if the token is a verb (System Requirements)
        elif token.lower() in ['shall', 'will', 'must']:
            extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
        
        # Check if the token is a noun (Shared Phenomena)
        elif token.lower() in ['data', 'information', 'configuration']:
            extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)
    
    # Return the extracted entities
    return extracted_entities
``` 

```python
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],

    }
``` 

```python
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+(?:s|es)?\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+(?:s|es)?\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+(?:s|es)?\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+(?:s|es)?\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+(?:s|es)?\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
import json
import re

def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ hardware\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(input_string))
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|The [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|the [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|The [A-Z][a-z]+ system|the [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+|equipment)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+|users|personnel|operators|IDFS data sets|operational data)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|the [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|the [A-Z][a-z]+ system|the VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System|the APAF system|the APAF data system)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ configuration|correlator configuration|real time monitor/control|hardware testing/servicing|keep the application configured|to provide access to the interfaces|role-based control|transfer dynamic control data|monitor data|ensure high standards of security and access control|validate the incoming data|user request|operational data|easy system access|aid testing and debugging|centralized deployment and maintenance)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ configuration|configuration information|the TMDD standard|the incoming data|user request|operational data|dynamic control data|IDFS data sets|the engineering and ancillary information|the states|the APAF Operations Procedures Document|the IEEE STD 830 document|the VLA Expansion Project Correlator Monitor and Control System|the VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System|the APAF system|the APAF data system)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
``` 

```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    schema = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    entities = {entity: [] for entity in schema}
    
    words = sentence.split()
    for word in words:
        word = word.lower()
        for entity in schema:
            if entity.lower() in word:
                entities[entity].append(word)
    
    return entities
```

```python
    # System Requirements
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s+system\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('The system')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(digital programmable|thermostat|humidistat|power switch|contact sensor|security sound and light alarm|environmental controller|master control unit|UPS devices|CCTNS system|Correlator Monitor and Control System|VCI|Master Correlator Control Computer|Sensor|coffee maker|small appliances|hot swappable devices|components|generators|commercial power sources)\b'
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'].extend(physical_devices)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a home|an enclosed space|lights|window|the patient|the sun|the old)\b'
    environment_objects = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'].extend(environment_objects)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a database|a magnetic stripe card|a tap|hard disk|a COTS operating system|the VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System|IDFS data sets|communication network)\b'
    external_systems = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'].extend(external_systems)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(to monitor and regulate the temperature of an enclosed space|to control a home|to change the state of an appliance|to monitor the current state of an appliance|self-monitoring|signal|time remaining on backup power|replaceability modular design principles|maximal practical use of available hot swappable devices and components|to continue in the event of an Monitor and Control System network failure|to provide information about the state of a power switch|to manage up to one hundred 115 volt, 10 amp power switches|to manage up to fifty door and window contact sensors|to adhere to the standards, policies and procedures of the American Society of Heating, Refrigerating and Air-Conditioning Engineers|to process the engineering and ancillary information necessary for calibration and science validation into IDFS data sets|to be designed in manner that operational data is not lost in case of any failure of equipment or communication network)\b'
    system_requirements = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'].extend(system_requirements)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the temperature|the humidity|wireless signals|information about the state|the state|the current state of an appliance|configuration information|a physical correlator hardware configuration|operational data|signal|time remaining on backup power)\b'
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(shared_phenomena)

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(processor|computer|controller|interface|hardware|module)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(patient|sun|old)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(database|card|tap|disk)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+not\s+exceed\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(data|information|messages|echoes|health|error|configuration)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System throughput shall not exceed 50% of the throughput capability delivered over any 10 second period, and as an objective throughput shall not exceed 25% of throughput capability delivered over any 10 second period."))
```

```python
    # Return the extracted entities
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ software\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ hardware\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ requirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ phenomenon\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
input_string = "The Tactical Control System software will provide the functionality and capability to receive, process, and disseminate video and telemetry data from the AV and payload; perform mission planning; monitor and control the payload; monitor and control the AV; and monitor and control the data links."
print(extract_entities(input_string))
``` 

import json
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
```python
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)

    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+-?\d* [A-Z][a-z]+-?\d* system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+-?\d* [A-Z][a-z]+-?\d* device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+-?\d* [A-Z][a-z]+-?\d* environment\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+-?\d* [A-Z][a-z]+-?\d* system\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+-?\d* [A-Z][a-z]+-?\d* requirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+-?\d* [A-Z][a-z]+-?\d* phenomenon\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
``` 

```python
import re
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)

    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}

    # Extract entities for each entity type
    for token in tokens:
        # Check if the token is a noun
        if pos_tag([token])[0][1] in ['NN', 'NNS', 'NNP', 'NNPS']:
            # Check if the token is a software system
            if re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', token):
                extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a physical device
            elif re.match(r'\b[0-9]+\b', token):
                extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an environment object
            elif re.match(r'\b[a-z]+\b', token):
                extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an external system
            elif re.match(r'\b[0-9]+\b', token):
                extracted_entities['External System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a system requirement
            elif re.match(r'\b[0-9]+\b', token):
                extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a shared phenomenon
            elif re.match(r'\b[a-z]+\b', token):
                extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    return extracted_entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+)\s+software'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+)\s+device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+)\s+interface'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+provide'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+have'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
``` 

```python
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}

    # Extract entities for each entity type
    for token in tokens:
        if token in entity_types:
            extracted_entities[token].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['system', 'software', 'hardware', 'device', 'environment', 'requirements', 'phenomena']:
            if token.lower() == 'system':
                extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
            elif token.lower() == 'software':

            elif token.lower() == 'hardware':
                extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
            elif token.lower() == 'device':
                extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
            elif token.lower() == 'environment':
                extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
            elif token.lower() == 'requirements':
                extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
            elif token.lower() == 'phenomena':
                extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    return extracted_entities
``` 

        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []

```python
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object

    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
``` 

```python
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'to\s+(.*)', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}

                extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a physical device
            elif re.match(r'\w+ Device', token):
                extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an environment object
            elif re.match(r'\w+ Object', token):
                extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an external system
            elif re.match(r'\w+ System', token):
                extracted_entities['External System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a system requirement
            elif re.match(r'\w+ Requirements', token):
                extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a shared phenomenon
            elif re.match(r'\w+ Phenomena', token):
                extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)
    
    return extracted_entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*implemented\s*using\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*implemented\s*using\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*compatible\s*with\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*implemented\s*using\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*capable\s*of\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(2))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*compatible\s*with\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(2))

    return entities
``` 

    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, text)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, text)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, text)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) requirement'

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:Monitor|Correlator|Center|DigitalHome|Remote GUI|VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System|Center-to-Center Project)\s+System"
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'] = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(?:security\s+breach|contact\s+sensor|magnetic\s+alarm\s+contact\s+switches|Vehicle Priority|Reversible Lane|Dynamic Lane|HAR|Traffic Signal|light\s+and\s+sound\s+alarms|sound\s+alarm|lights|switch)"
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'] = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:map|patient|sun|old|user|door|window|LCS|DMS|Reversible Lane|Dynamic Lane|HAR|Traffic Signal)"
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'] = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:database|magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|tap|hard\s+disk|upper\s+system|alarm\s+system|pages|special\s+error\s+pages)"
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'] = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:to\s+support|shall\s+be\s+able\s+to|shall\s+support|shall\s+include|shall\s+have|shall\s+be\s+capable\s+of|shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+support)"
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'] = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:status\s+and\s+error\s+messages|error\s+messages|messages|status\s+information|displaying\s+the\s+following|device\s+control\s+command|network\s+identifier|traffic\s+signal\s+identifier|username|password|plan|duration|lane\s+plan|configuration\s+information|physical\s+correlator\s+hardware\s+configuration|Warning\s+messages|mission\s+criticality)"
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)

    return entities
``` 

import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (Monitor|Control|System|Correlator|Monitor and Control System|Center|device status requestor|Traffic Signal|Correlator Monitor and Control System|Correlator Monitor and Control System test software|Correlator Monitor and Control System system layers)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (Correlator|device|device status requestor|Traffic Signal|Correlator Monitor and Control System|Correlator Monitor and Control System system layers|Correlator Monitor and Control System test software|Correlator|Correlator Monitor and Control System)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (user|operator|patient|sun|old|player|center|device status requestor|Traffic Signal|Correlator Monitor and Control System|Correlator Monitor and Control System system layers|Correlator Monitor and Control System test software|Correlator|Correlator Monitor and Control System)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|upper system|pages|special error pages|VCI)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, input_string)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (access to all messaging,|monitor, and control traffic|transfer dynamic control data|monitor data|resolve the error|information for command timeframe request|network identifier|device type|days commands accepted|times commands accepted|Target Traffic Signal and Plan|Target Traffic Signal|Plan|making the content easy to understand|finding similar information at the same position|actions|actions the user can take to resolve the error|provide the user with a logical and coherent interface|uniquely identified|categorized in a logical fashion|filtered as to content, detail, and message rate|Making text resizable by the user|Using appropriate terminology specific to the userâ€™s tasks and information needs|ensure that important mission data is not obscured)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, input_string)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (error and status messages|messages|configuration data|dynamic control data|error messages|status and error messages|network identifier|device type|days commands accepted|times commands accepted|Target Traffic Signal and Plan|Target Traffic Signal|Plan|message traffic|content|detail|message rate|Text|Pages|appropriate terminology|error messages|information for command timeframe request)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):

        'Software System': [],

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

```python
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|can|will|shall)\s*(\w+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|can|will|shall)\s*(\w+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        if match[2] not in ['a', 'an', 'the']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|can|will|shall)\s*(\w+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        if match[2] not in ['a', 'an', 'the']:
            entities['External System'].append(match[2])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|can|is|are)\s*(\w+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|can|is|are)\s*(\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [system.replace('The ', '').replace(' System', '') for system in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sdevice\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device.replace(' device', '') for device in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
``` 

```python
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+(?: and [A-Z][a-z]+)*\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sdevice\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+(controller|sensor|device|unit|terminal|system)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+(system|database|card|disk)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s+(.*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+and\s+(\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(2))

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall have a capability to be integrated and operated from land based platforms."))
``` 
